quotes.quote: Fatigue dominates the lives of those who are living without direction and dreams.
Fatigue is what we experience, but it is what a match is to an atomic bomb.
Fatigue is your friend. Through exhaustion and through people just being so depleted, the stuff around the nerve endings gets worn away and other things begin to emerge and you take way bigger risks.
What is the answer to this fatigue? Relax! Relax! Relax! Learn to relax while you are doing your work!
Nothing is so fatiguing as the eternal hanging on of an uncompleted task.

Fatigue dulls the pain, but awakes enticing thoughts of death. So! that is the way in which you are tempted to overcome your loneliness -- by making the ultimate escape from life. -- No! It may be that death is to be your ultimate gift to life: it must not be an act of treachery against it.
Fatigue roughens up the edges of your nerves; it exposes your fears and your weaknesses.
Fear and fatigue block the mind. Face both, then courage and confidence flows into you.
There is no fatigue so wearisome as that which comes from lack of work.
There is fatigue so great that the body cries, even in its sleep.
The strongest have their moments of fatigue.
Fatigue is the safest sleeping draught.
All forms of fear produce fatigue.
The fatigue produced on the muscles of the human frame does not altogether depend on the actual force employed in each effort, but partly on the frequency with which it is exerted.
Fatigue, discomfort, discouragement are merely symptoms of effort.
Many fears are born of fatigue and loneliness.
There's digital fatigue. When you can do everything, you can actually do nothing.
So, to prevent fatigue and worry, the first rule is: Rest often. Rest before you get tired.
Our fatigue is often caused not by work, but by worry, frustration and resentment.
A little flattery will support a man through great fatigue.
How sweet is rest after fatigue! How sweet will heaven be when our journey is ended.
One is hardly sensible of fatigue while he marches to music.
Hard work never brings fatigue. It brings satisfaction
There is no habit you will value so much as that of walking far without fatigue.
Those who expect to reap the blessings of freedom must, like men, undergo the fatigue of supporting it.
Great is the power of habit. It teaches us to bear fatigue and to despise wounds and pain.
Fatigue fatigue is when you're tired of being tired.
Fatigue is the best pillow.
